passive.name: ABSOLUTION
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) ABSOLUTION
                                Senna can absorb Mist by attacking souls that spawn from dead enemies. She can also siphon Mist from enemy champions she hits twice within 4s, dealing 1.2-12% () of their current health as bonus physical damage. (6 second cooldown per target)Each stack of Mist grants 1 Attack Damage. Every 20 stacks of Mist grant 15 Attack Range and 15% Critical Strike Chance. 35% of excess Critical Strike Chance is converted to physical vamp.Relic Cannon - Attacks take extra time to fire, dealing 11 bonus physical damage, and briefly grant Senna 10% of the target's Movement Speed.Senna does not gain Attack Damage on level up. Her Critical Strikes deal 25% less damage.

q.name: (Q) PIERCING DARKNESS
q.description:
(Q) PIERCING DARKNESS
 15s   70/80/90/100 
                                
                                
                                Shoots a bolt of piercing shadow through any object, dealing 50 physical damage (50/90/130/170 + 60% bonus ) to enemies, slowing by 15% (15% + 0.1% bonus   + 0.06% ) for 0.75/1/1.25/1.5s  and restoring 40 Health (40/70/100/130 + 40% bonus  + 25% ) to ally champions.Attack reduce Piercing Darkness's cooldown by 1 second(s).This ability cast range matches Senna's attack range and its cast time is improved with Attack Speed. It applies on-hit effects to enemy champions.
notes: range matches Senna's attack range and its cast time is improved with Attack Speed

w.name: (W) LAST EMBRACE
w.description:
(W) LAST EMBRACE
 11s   55/60/65/70 
                                
                                
                                Sends forth a wave of Black Mist, dealing 90 physical damage (90/155/220/285 + 70% bonus ) to the first enemy hit. After a 1 second delay the target and other nearby enemies are Rooted for 1.3/1.6/1.9/2.2 seconds.

e.name: (E) CURSE OF THE BLACK MIST
e.description:
(E) CURSE OF THE BLACK MIST
 22/20/18/16s   70 
                                
                                
                                Dissolves into a cloud mist for 6/6.5/7/7.5 seconds, becoming a Wrath. Allied champions who enter the mist are Camouflaged and become Wraiths when they leave.Wraiths gain 20% Movement Speed, are Unselectable, and hide their identities as long as no enemy champions are nearby.Camouflaged: These units are hidden from view. They are revealed by nearby enemy champions turrets, and True Sight.

r.name: (R) DAWNING SHADOW
r.description:
(R) DAWNING SHADOW
 85/80/75s   100 
                                
                                
                                Fires a global wave that shields allies from 120 damage (120/160/200 + 40%  + 4 per Mist) for 3 seconds, while dealing 250 physical damage (250/375/500 + 120% bonus  + 50% ) and applies Mist to enemies caught in the center.

core_items_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

boots_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

boots_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
boots_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

boots_detailed.active: Shield nearby allies for 2.5 seconds, absorbing up to 150 damage
boots_detailed.description: Boot enchant that provides team protection. Essential for supports who want to shield their team.

runes_detailed.description: After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal reduced damage.
